.page2 {
    /* background-color: red; */
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 100%;
    grid-template-rows: 15% 10% 50% 25%;
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
    margin-top: 5vw;
}

.scroll {
    white-space: nowrap;
    overflow-x: hidden;
    overflow-y: hidden;
}

.img-container {
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    display: inline-block;
    animation-name: anime;
    animation-duration: 9s;
    animation-iteration-count: infinite;
    animation-timing-function: linear;
}

.img-container img {
    height: 100%;
    width: 14%;
    border-radius: 50%;
    object-fit: cover;
    object-position: top;
    margin-left: 2vw;
    /* display: none; */
}

@keyframes anime {
    from {
        transform: translateX(0);
    }

    to {
        transform: translateX(-100%);
    }
}


.alphabet {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 1vw;
    margin-top: 3vw;
    /* background-color: blue; */
    border-bottom: 2px solid black;
    border-top: 2px solid black;
}


.alphabet h4:nth-child(10) {
    padding: 0.4vw 0.9vw;
}

.alphabet h3 {
    font-size: 2vw;
    font-family: Nexabold;
    font-weight: bolder;
    font-style: italic;
    border-bottom: 3px solid black;
    margin-right: 1vw;
}

.alphabet h4 {
    font-family: Nexabold;
    font-weight: bolder;
    padding: 0.5vw 0.8vw;
    /* background-color: yellow; */
    border-radius: 50%;
    color: rgb(71, 71, 71);
    font-size: 1vw;

}


.alphabet h4:hover {
    border: 1px solid black;
    cursor: pointer;
}

.page2-container {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 50% 50%;
    grid-template-rows: 100% 100%;
    padding: 3vw;
    /* background-color: khaki; */
}

.left {
    /* background-color: blue; */
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 100%;
    grid-template-rows: 90% 10%;
    /* padding: 3vw; */
    padding-left: 8vw;
}

.left img {
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    object-position: center;
}

.left h1 {
    font-size: 2vw;
    font-weight: 900;
    font-family: Monumentbold;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    padding-top: 1.8vw;
}


.right {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 100%;
    grid-template-rows: 60%;
    /* background-color: red;    */
    /* padding-top: 3vw; */
    padding-right: 15vw;
    padding-left: 3vw;
}

.right img {
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    object-position: top;
}


.flex {
    padding-top: 1.5vw;
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 45% 45%;
    justify-content: space-between;
}

.flex h4 {
    font-family: Nexabold;
}

.flex h6 {
    font-family: Nexabold;

}

.page2-bottom {
    /* background-color: blue; */
    position: relative;
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 50% 50%;
    grid-template-rows: 100%;
}

.page2-container>img {
    width: 55%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    object-position: 60% 40%;
    margin-left: 3vw;
}

.circular-div {
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    height: 200px;
    width: 200px;
    /* background-color: red; */
    margin-left: 20vw;
    margin-top: 5vw;
}

.circular-div img {
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
}


.circular-div img:nth-child(2) {
    color: black;
    filter: invert();
    width: 30%;
    height: 25%;
    position: absolute;
    top: 38%;
    left: 35%;
    /* transform: translate(-); */
}
